body.name: GipGiper Nightstand with 3 Drawers, Night Stand Dresser for Bedroom, Small Dresser with Fabric Bins, Leather Finish, Modern Bedside Table End Side Table for Living Room, Dorm, Closet, Nursery, White
features: 🏡White Nightstand with 3 Drawers: GipGiper modern night stand suitable for bedroom, college dorm, kids' room, living room, nursery, closet, home office and more. This 3 drawers dresser can be use as storage side table, bedroom table, nightstand and end table for bedroom, it can match any home style.

🏡Minimalist and Practical: Add a touch of elegance to your bedroom with our white nightstand. Measuring 18.5'' L x 13.8'' W x 24.8'' H(47cm x 35cm x 63cm). The height matches most of beds, sofa and chair makes it ideal to use as a nightstand in bedroom, as an end side table in living room, or as a toy storage in nursery.

🏡Premium Details: When you get it, you will be as surprised by its super quality and texture as you are surprised by its appearance. We use faux leather instead of cheap non-woven fabric, easy to clean and never wrinkle, 4 adjustable feet protects your floor from scratches and makes this nightstand level placed. The 3.94'' high base for extra storage.

🏡Spacious Storage Space: Simple and modern style makes it fit to any decor. Lightweight design and 3 removable drawers are convenient for daily use. The top flat and wide small drawer to make it easier for you to store their bedtime supplies, such as keys, eyeglasses, mobile phones, small bottles, etc. The wooden top is convenient to clean, the bearing capacity up to 110 lbs and perfect to place alarm clock, charger, table lamp, book etc. Keeping the most-used items within your reach.

🏡Easy Installation and Customer Service: GipGiper white bedside table for bedroom will be a great housewarming gift or Christmas gift for your family and friends. This white dresser is easy to assemble with the included hardware within 20 minutes. If you have any questions or concerns, please let us know. Your satisfaction is always our priority.

Product Details The Board Can Bear 110lbs The top board is made of high quality thickened material, 0.6" thick, and can hold up to 110lbs. Fabric Drawers Load 20lbs The drawer is composed of three layers of materials. It comes with a thickened load-bearing board, with a total load-bearing capacity of 20lbs. Waterproof and Scratch-Proof The outer layer of the fabric drawer is made of artificial leather, which is wear-resistant, scratch-resistant and waterproof. Adjustable Feet The four legs of the bedside table come with adjustable feet, making it easy to handle even uneven floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised and Happy.........
reviews.reviewText: For a product at this price point, I was expecting maybe a missing part or something misaligned or real hassles putting it together. Maybe not sturdy.WRONG!Well packaged. All parts were there....even extra screws! Clear directions. Sturdy. A well-designed and well packed nice bedside table. Materials are perfect for what I need. Amazed that both of my new tables are already put together and alongside my bed and a big improvement over the plastic drawers I had before.Impressive product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for storage
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t realize that the drawers were fabric but it’s a nice nightstand and good for the price. Easy to assemble. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a cute white nightstand with drawers and this one caught my eye. It was SUPER easy to put together. I didn’t notice before purchasing that the drawers are the cloth foldable drawers. They look fine but wish I known this before buying.

reviews.reviewerName: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT PURCHASE THIS
reviews.reviewText: The drawers are not smooth. I tried to reach the seller and couldn't find any way to do so. Amazon wants me to disassemble two nightstands and send them. They want me to spend time on the phone with my complaint, unassemble the two pieces and send them back. So it's cost me time by two hours and they could care less. Don't buy furniture from Amazon. I have three things to return. I feel the sell whatever items they can and the quality of the vendors has gone down. 0/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together and it fits perfectly in the space where I needed it to go. Looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: So i ordered this stand because i was looking for a inexpensive nightstand that i could use along side my bed which also be easy to assemble so i came across this and it caught my eye. When i received this stand i was blown away with the quality this has to offer. The wood feels premium but i would say that if u apply some pressure to it you will end up breaking it but if you are not doing with it like that u should be good. It was easy to assemble and took me around 10 minutes. Once assembled my concern was that the draws would not stay in place because they are made out of a cloth materail but i was wrong this is very sturdy the only thing i do have a complaint about is that they do not include a allen key to fix the bolts and i had to go to the store to purchase one of that size. Overall this is a great stand and it is 100% worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy for what it is.
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn't expect much from the cloth drawers. The wood top is solid. Very easy to assemble.
